name: INAppendToNoteIntent
desc: A request to append content to a note.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(targetNote: INNote?, content: INNoteContent?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified note and content.

items.name: var content: INNoteContent?
items.desc: The content to append to the note.

items.name: var targetNote: INNote?
items.desc: The note to receive the additional content.
